document.full_text: a 25-year-old texas man has received the first full face transplant done in the united states, boston's brigham and women's hospital said on monday.
document.title: first u.s. full face transplant done in boston
lines_and_colors: a 25-year-old texas man has received the first full face transplant done in the united states, boston's brigham and women's hospital said on monday.
